tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE assets (
  asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_name VARCHAR(100),
  barcode VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE asset_tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id INT,
  tracking_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES assets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assets (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  barcode STRING NOT NULL,
  name STRING,
  description STRING
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_code STRING NOT NULL,
  description STRING
)

CREATE TABLE asset_tracking (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id UUID REFERENCES assets(id),
  location_id UUID REFERENCES locations(id),
  scan_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE asset_assets (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    barcode VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    acquisition_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE asset_categories (
    category_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE asset_scans (
    scan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID REFERENCES asset_assets(asset_id),
    scan_date TIMESTAMP,
    scan_results TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE asset_users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    password_hash VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE asset_tracking (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  barcode VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  asset_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  last_scanned TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE asset_details (
  asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
  model VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  warranty_start DATE,
  warranty_end DATE
);

CREATE TABLE asset_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id INT,
  scan_time TIMESTAMP,
  scanned_by VARCHAR(50),
  location_before VARCHAR(100),
  location_after VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  role VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(100),
  details TEXT
);
